# `ConditionalGroupActivation` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| pilotRule | [`ConditionalGroupActivationPilotRule`](conditionalgroupactivationpilotrule-definition.md) | No | The pilot rule for this queue, which executes periodically to determine queue health |
| rules | [`ConditionalGroupActivationRule[]`](conditionalgroupactivationrule-definition.md) | No | The set of rules to be periodically executed on the queue (if the pilot rule evaluates as true or there is no pilot rule) |
